043b0f4cb8a9898a: A faali $1 ba e paale a boma $2.
36ab42ea9b175608: A  faali  $1 koŋ baŋ yi a boma $2.
8a7d463b85318e9b: Fo boɔrɔ la ka fo de a pɛll mare $1 a ɔbgyɛte $2?
9c52a30c9951cc95: (IMPORTANT) ka foŋ mare a pɛll ŋa a ɔbgyɛte ŋa, tontonna zaa naŋ taa sori na kaa a ɔbgyɛte na tõɔ kaa la a kyɛ danloodi a pɛll!
ac835a2096c3749a: A pɛll $1 la ka a ɔbgyɛte $2 ko sommo yizie, kyɛ ba mare o, a lɛ na o koŋ baŋ wɛle.
bf1b8bc541368775: A ɔɔgyɛ (a klaasi ''$1'') ba boɔrɔ a entafeesi (''$2''), azuiŋ faali koŋ toɔŋ paale.
ceb4baf1dec2583c: A boma (a klaasi ''$1'') ba boɔrɔ niŋeŋ (''$2''), azuiŋ faali koŋ baŋ tage yi a poɔŋ.
cff5cb86f8812020: Mare a pɛll meŋɛ $1 ko ɔbgyɛte $2, na bare tontonna zaa vuo naŋ na baŋ kaa a ɔbgyɛte na kaa kyɛ danloodi a pɛll?
dace6594abf86af8: Wɛle a pɛll $1 yi a ɔbgyɛte $2?
e9c1e2ce58e0a25f: A pɛll $1 da daŋ mare la a ɔbgyɛte $2 eŋɛ.
